goblin.desc:
small, black-hearted humanoid that lair in despoiled dungeons and other dismal settings.
Individually weak, they gather in large numbers to torment other creatures.

skeleton.desc:
spooky and scary these rattling undead monsters have a bone to pick with you.
They are found in abandoned graveyards or out in the wild if a grave has been defiled.

dark orc.desc: Impossible to reason with, these dark grey monsters are out for blood.

zombie.desc: rot and visible bone scatter their bodies.
